name: CRYOGENESIS (itch)
description:
A prototype game for GDIM 161/ICS 166.

EXPERIMENT CODENAME: CRYOGENESIS. LET THE EXPERIMENT COMMENCE.

CRYOGENESIS is a simple prototype puzzle game about manipulating the states of water. 

  • Fire freeze and heat rays to convert pools of water into ice and vice versa. 
  • Connected pools will share their states of matter. Use an ice block to stop this sharing property. 
  • 5 rooms total- beat them all!

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Freeze Ray

Right Click: Heat Ray

E (Hold): Pick up boxes
